content.description: Modern arcade-style interpretation of the classic FARO card game built with Godot Engine
content.intro: First published Godot project focused on UI/UX design principles and game feel enhancements.
content.body: Implemented game logic, visual effects system, scoring mechanics, and custom pixel art assets using GDScript and Aseprite.
content.conclusion: Play the game on itch.io. Contact me to discuss game design decisions and implementation approach.

content.description: Statistics-driven lacrosse simulation and management game published on Steam
content.intro: Largest personal game development project demonstrating complex systems design and data-driven gameplay mechanics.
content.body: Developed simulation engine with realistic lacrosse mechanics, team management systems, statistical tracking, and UI framework using Unity and C#.
content.conclusion: Available on Steam. Contact me to discuss the simulation algorithms, balancing process, and technical architecture.
